introduction: Report obstructions on the road such as mud, illegal signs, overhanging tree branches, hedges, builders skips and scaffolding to the local council. Enter the postcode to find the council's website for more information.
overview: You can report obstructions on the road such as mud, illegal signs, overhanging tree branches, hedges, builders skips and scaffolding to the local council
title: Report an obstruction on the road
